text: Jagannath Pahadia (15 January 1932 - 19 May 2021) was an Indian politician. He was known for being the former leader of the Indian National Congress party. He was the Governor of Haryana from 2009 to 2014, Governor of Bihar from 1989 to 1990 and the Chief Minister of Rajasthan from 1980 to 1981. He was born in Rajasthan. Pahadia died of COVID-19 at a hospital in New Delhi, India on 19 May 2021 at the age of 89.Former Rajasthan CM Jagannath Pahadia dies of COVID-19 ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in New Delhi Category:Governors of Bihar Category:Governors of Haryana
title: Jagannath Pahadia
